SEARCH
Package com.csse3200.game.components.minigames.pool.physics

Class TableSpace

java.lang.Object
com.csse3200.game.components.minigames.pool.physics.TableSpace
public final class TableSpace extends Object
Provides utility methods for converting between world-space and normalised table-space coordinates.

Normalised coordinates are represented in the range [0..1] along both axes, where (0,0) corresponds to the bottom-left corner of the table and (1,1) corresponds to the top-right corner.

World coordinates are centered at (0,0), meaning the center of the table corresponds to (0,0) in world-space, with ±X and ±Y extending to table edges.

These conversions are used primarily by PoolGameDisplay for rendering, and by PoolGame for mapping between UI and physics data.

  • Method Details

    • toNorm

      public static com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 toNorm(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 wp, TableConfig cfg)
      Converts a world-space position into normalised table-space coordinates.

      Values are clamped to the range [0..1].

      Parameters:
      wp - the world position vector (meters)
      cfg - the TableConfig describing table dimensions
      Returns:
      a new Vector2 in normalised table space

    • toNorm

      public static List<com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2> toNorm(List<com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2> wps, TableConfig cfg)
      Converts a list of world-space positions into normalised table-space coordinates.

      Each entry is clamped to the range [0..1].

      Parameters:
      wps - a list of world-space positions (meters)
      cfg - the TableConfig describing table dimensions
      Returns:
      a list of normalised coordinate vectors

    • fromNorm

      public static com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 fromNorm(float nx, float ny, TableConfig cfg)
      Converts normalised table-space coordinates into world-space.

      Values are clamped to [0..1] before conversion.

      Parameters:
      nx - normalised X coordinate (0..1)
      ny - normalised Y coordinate (0..1)
      cfg - the TableConfig describing table dimensions
      Returns:
      a new Vector2 in world coordinates

    • fromNorm

      public static com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 fromNorm(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 n, TableConfig cfg)
      Converts a normalised coordinate vector into world-space.

      Equivalent to fromNorm(float, float, TableConfig) using the vector’s components.

      Parameters:
      n - normalised position vector (0..1)
      cfg - the TableConfig describing table dimensions
      Returns:
      a new Vector2 in world coordinates
